product_name: DiorCapture Totale Retishot Retinol Night Treatment
summary: SummaryA retinol solution that corrects the look of 6 age-related issues: visible pores, dull complexion, roughness, unevenness, marks and imperfections.
details: DetailsBenefitsInfused with [H.P.]1 Retinol - 0.1% concentrated pure retinol - and longoza extract, skin quality is visibly improves for a more youthful appearance day after day. Harnessing the benefits of retinol, Retishot promotes skin renewal and refines skin's texture.FeaturesSkin Concerns: anti-aging, wrinkles, fine lines, lack of elasticity, loss of firmnessSkin Types: Mixed, dry, normal, oily, very dryItem 2629090How To UseBecause retinol is photosensitive, Capture Totale Retishot should only be used as part of your nighttime skincare routine.Define facial contours with Capture Totale Le Sérum.Smooth Capture Totale Retishot over the entire face for intensive care, being careful to avoid the areas around the eyes and lips.Gently massage Capture Totale Firming & Wrinkle-Correcting Cream over the face, using outward movements.In the morning, use sun protection with a minimum of SPF 15, such as Capture Dreamskin Moist & Perfect Cushion.Contains vitamin A. Consider your daily intake before use. If redness, feelings of heat, tingling or dryness appears, space out applications until the skin becomes accustomed to the product. These temporary effects are normal and expected with retinol. Avoid the eye and mouth area. In case of contact, rinse immediately with water. Use sun protection (SPF 15) the day after application and avoid sun exposure while using this product.IngredientsAqua (Water), Propanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Panthenol, Trehalose, Aframomum Angustifolium Seed Extract, Adenosine, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Sulfite, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Tromethamine, Allantoin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Retinol, Mannitol, Glyceryl Stearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Palmitic Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Yeast Ferment Extract, Beta-Carotene, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-11, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ascorbic Acid, Glutathione, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Dimethicone, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Carbomer, Polysilicone-11, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Because retinol is photosensitive, Capture Totale Retishot should only be used as part of your nighttime skincare routine.Define facial contours with Capture Totale Le Sérum.Smooth Capture Totale Retishot over the entire face for intensive care, being careful to avoid the areas around the eyes and lips.Gently massage Capture Totale Firming & Wrinkle-Correcting Cream over the face, using outward movements.In the morning, use sun protection with a minimum of SPF 15, such as Capture Dreamskin Moist & Perfect Cushion.Contains vitamin A. Consider your daily intake before use. If redness, feelings of heat, tingling or dryness appears, space out applications until the skin becomes accustomed to the product. These temporary effects are normal and expected with retinol. Avoid the eye and mouth area. In case of contact, rinse immediately with water. Use sun protection (SPF 15) the day after application and avoid sun exposure while using this product.

reviews.headline: Exceed Expectations!
reviews.comments: I wasnt sure about buying retinol from a makeup brand, but i know Dior is a prestige brand so i trusted on them and bought it. And i dont regret it. Its gently enough to use it everyday. I have seen positive changes very quickly. Skin color is uniform, less age spots, a subtle glow is appearing. 100% recommended! Im 46 by the way.

reviews.headline: Enjoyed!
reviews.comments: Enjoyed this product to jumpstart my new skincare regimine will follow in my daytime regimine with the hylashot

rollup.name: Capture Totale Retishot Retinol Night Treatment
